languages.text: "Я нес службу на фрегате "Страж Бездны", но был схвачен в схватке друкари, взявшими его на абордаж. Они приволокли меня в Комморру и запихнули на одну из своих гондол, чтобы куда-то перевезти. Тогда я из последних сил схватил пилота и спрыгнул вниз, в Прорву, — ксенос смягчил падение, и я чудом выжил. Там Комиссар меня и нашел, после чего предал и отправил подыхать на арену".

traits.locale_text: "Я нес службу на фрегате "Страж Бездны", но был схвачен в схватке друкари, взявшими его на абордаж. Они приволокли меня в Комморру и запихнули на одну из своих гондол, чтобы куда-то перевезти. Тогда я из последних сил схватил пилота и спрыгнул вниз, в Прорву, — ксенос смягчил падение, и я чудом выжил. Там Комиссар меня и нашел, после чего предал и отправил подыхать на арену".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."
languages.original_text: "Я нес службу на фрегате "Страж Бездны", но был схвачен в схватке друкари, взявшими его на абордаж. Они приволокли меня в Комморру и запихнули на одну из своих гондол, чтобы куда-то перевезти. Тогда я из последних сил схватил пилота и спрыгнул вниз, в Прорву, — ксенос смягчил падение, и я чудом выжил. Там Комиссар меня и нашел, после чего предал и отправил подыхать на арену".

traits.locale_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. Got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. Barely breathing, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me before betraying me and sending to die in the arena."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. Got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. Barely breathing, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me before betraying me and sending to die in the arena."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. Struggling to get my act together, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. Struggling to get my act together, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."

traits.locale_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「フリゲート艦、深淵の番人に乗船していました。デュカーリの乗り込み部隊に捕まったのです。コモラフに連れて行かれ、行き先の分からないゴンドラに乗せられました。私は最後の力を振り絞ってパイロットをつかみ、裂け目に飛び込んだ。異種族の体が落下のクッションとなり、何とか生き延びることができたのです。そこでコミッサーに拾われました。そして彼の裏切りにより、私は闘技場で死んだのです」
languages.original_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."

traits.locale_text: 「フリゲート艦、深淵の番人に乗船していました。デュカーリの乗り込み部隊に捕まったのです。コモラフに連れて行かれ、行き先の分からないゴンドラに乗せられました。私は最後の力を振り絞ってパイロットをつかみ、裂け目に飛び込んだ。異種族の体が落下のクッションとなり、何とか生き延びることができたのです。そこでコミッサーに拾われました。そして彼の裏切りにより、私は闘技場で死んだのです」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “我原本在‘深渊守望者’号护卫舰上服役，黑暗灵族攻上了我们的船。他们俘虏了我，把我丢上了他们的小船，准备把我带到科摩罗，不知道带到什么地方。于是我拼尽最后的力量，趁飞行员不注意，抓住他一起跳进了裂隙。应该是那个异形的肉体起到了缓冲作用，不知怎么的，我活了下来。政委就是在那里找到我的。后来，他出卖了我，把我丢到竞技场里送死。”
languages.original_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."

traits.locale_text: “我原本在‘深渊守望者’号护卫舰上服役，黑暗灵族攻上了我们的船。他们俘虏了我，把我丢上了他们的小船，准备把我带到科摩罗，不知道带到什么地方。于是我挣扎着，趁飞行员不注意，抓住他一起跳进了裂隙。应该是那个异形的肉体起到了缓冲作用，不知怎么的，我活了下来。政委就是在那里找到我的。后来，他出卖了我，把我丢到竞技场里送死。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Servía en una fragata, la Vigilante del Abismo. Fui capturado por un grupo de asalto Drukhari. Me llevaron a Commorragh y me arrojaron a bordo de una de sus góndolas con destino a quién sabe dónde. Con mis últimas fuerzas, agarré al piloto y salté al Abismo. El cuerpo del xenos amortiguó mi caída, así que, de algún modo, sobreviví. Allí me encontró el Comisario antes de traicionarme y enviarme a morir a la arena».
languages.original_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."

traits.locale_text: «Servía en una fragata, la Vigilante del Abismo. Fui capturado por un grupo de asalto Drukhari. Me llevaron a Commorragh y me arrojaron a bordo de una de sus góndolas con destino a quién sabe dónde. Luchando por recomponerme, agarré al piloto y salté al Abismo. El cuerpo del xenos amortiguó mi caída, así que, de algún modo, sobreviví. Allí me encontró el Comisario antes de traicionarme y enviarme a morir a la arena».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Ich habe auf einer Fregatte gedient, der Wächter des Abgrunds. Ein Drukhari-Entertrupp hat mich verschleppt. Sie haben mich nach Commorragh gebracht und an Bord einer Gondel nach Thron-weiß-wer geworfen. Ich habe mit letzter Kraft den Piloten gepackt und bin mit ihm in die Kluft gesprungen. Der Körper des Xenos hat meinen Fall abgefedert, so dass ich irgendwie überlebt habe. Dort hat der Kommissar mich gefunden und mich dann verraten und in die Arena geschickt, damit ich da verrecke."
languages.original_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe auf einer Fregatte gedient, der Wächter des Abgrunds. Ein Drukhari-Entertrupp hat mich verschleppt. Sie haben mich nach Commorragh gebracht und an Bord einer Gondel nach Thron-weiß-wer geworfen. Ich habe mir den Piloten geschnappt und bin mit ihm in die Kluft gesprungen. Der Körper des Xenos hat meinen Fall abgefedert, so dass ich irgendwie überlebt habe. So hat der Kommissar mich gefunden und mich dann verraten und in die Arena geschickt, damit ich da verrecke."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Je servais sur une frégate appelée le Veilleur de l'Abysse. Des Drukharis nous ont abordés, et j'ai été capturé. Ils m'ont amené à Commorragh et m'ont jeté à bord d'une de leurs nacelles à destination de je ne sais où. J'étais presque à bout de force, mais j'ai réussi à me saisir du pilote et j'ai sauté directement dans l'Abîme. Par chance, le xénos a amorti ma chute, et j'ai survécu. C'est là que le commissaire m'a trouvé... avant de me trahir et de m'envoyer mourir dans l'arène. »
languages.original_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."

traits.locale_text: « Je servais sur une frégate appelée le Veilleur des Abysses. Des Drukharis nous ont abordés, et j'ai été capturé. Ils m'ont amené à Commorragh et m'ont jeté à bord d'une de leurs nacelles à destination de je ne sais où. J'étais plutôt mal en point, mais j'ai réussi à me saisir du pilote et j'ai sauté directement dans l'Abîme. Par chance, le xénos a amorti ma chute, et j'ai survécu. C'est là que le commissaire m'a trouvé... avant de me trahir et de m'envoyer mourir dans l'arène. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Boşluğun Gözcüsü adındaki bir fırkateynde görev yapıyordum. Drukhari bordacılarına esir düştüm. Beni Commorragh'a getirdiler ve Tanrı İmparator bilir nereye giden gondollarından birine attılar. Son kalan gücümle pilotu kaptım, sonra da Yarık'a atladım. Zenonun bedeni, düşüşümün sertliğini azalttı, bir şekilde hayatta kaldım. Beni Komiser buldu, sonra da ihanet edip arenada ölümüme gönderdi."
languages.original_text: "I served on a frigate, the Watchman of the Abyss. I got captured by a Drukhari boarding party. They took me to Commorragh and threw me aboard one of their gondolas bound for who knows where. With the last of my strength, I grabbed the pilot and jumped down into the Chasm. The xenos's body cushioned my fall, so, somehow, I survived. That's where the Commissar found me, before betraying me and sending me to die in the arena."

traits.locale_text: "Boşluğun Gözcüsü adındaki bir fırkateynde görev yapıyordum. Bir Drukhari baskıncı grubu tarafından yakalandım. Beni Commorragh'a getirdiler ve Tanrı İmparator bilir nereye giden gondollarından birine attılar. Son kalan gücümle pilotu kaptım, sonra da Yarık'a atladım. Zenonun bedeni, düşüşümün etkisi azalttı ve ben, bir şekilde hayatta kaldım. İhanet edip arenada ölümüme göndermeden önce Komiser beni işte orada buldu."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
